StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetFacili.es]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID int, @Organiza.onType varchar(3) = NULL, @Status char(1) = null AS
SELECT RO.ORGANIZATION_ID, RO.NAME, RO.ISOPEN, SHORT_NAME, MCC_CODE, STREET, STREET2, CITY, STATE_CODE, ZIP_CODE, MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID, CONVERT(varchar(11), RO.EFFECTIVE_DATE, 13) EFFECTIVE_DATE, ORGANIZATION_TYPE, RO.USER_LOGIN, RO.DateClosed, OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID, CITY_CODE, COUNTY_CODE, STATE_GEO_CODE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON (RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AND CASE @Organiza.onType WHEN 'OSS' THEN RO.ORGANIZATION_ID ELSE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID END = @Organiza.onID) WHERE (@Status is NULL or RO.ISOPEN = @Status) ORDER BY CASE WHEN @Organiza.onID = 902 THEN RO.ORGANIZATION_ID END, CASE WHEN @Organiza.onID != 902 THEN RO.NAME END
